definition: to plot/to scheme/to calculate

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute

sentences.english: After a child's violent death, the calculations are murkier.
sentences.chinese: 在一個孩子橫死之後，內心的盤算會變得更加陰晦。

sentences.english: I'm still debating with myself whether to let you go abroad alone.
sentences.chinese: 我仍在心中盤算是否讓你獨自出國。

sentences.english: I’ve been trying to figure out when we should have the New Year’s party.
sentences.chinese: 我正在盤算着哪天開一個新年聚會。

sentences.english: I totaled my expenses with a calculator.
sentences.chinese: 我用盤算器算出開支的總金額。

sentences.english: We hope that the next negotiation will be the last one before signing the contrhvact.
sentences.chinese: 我們盤算下一交談判將是締結合同前的最後一輪談判。

sentences.english: I like to have an extra large green skirt.
sentences.chinese: 我盤算購件特大號的綠裙子。

sentences.english: I asked myself how long doing this documentary could take.
sentences.chinese: 我盤算着拍這部紀錄片得花多長時間。

sentences.english: I was just toying wit the idea of marrying my daughter off with him.
sentences.chinese: 我心裏正盤算着把我女兒嫁給他呢。

sentences.english: But this may not be what Marcos has in mind.
sentences.chinese: 不過，這可能與馬可士心中盤算的不同。

sentences.english: The school encouraged the students to practise using the computers.
sentences.chinese: 校方激勵學生練習應用盤算機。

sentences.english: Graduated from henan university of science and technology of computer network professional software college.
sentences.chinese: 畢業於河南科技大學軟件學院盤算機網絡專業。

sentences.english: The last time I saw her, she was planning to have a holiday.
sentences.chinese: 上次我見到她的時候，她正盤算着要休個假。

sentences.english: We are cerebration of agreement an order for your Flying Pigeon Brand bikes.
sentences.chinese: 我們正盤算訂購你方的飛鴿牌自行車。

sentences.english: Thinking only of some utter destruction and disaster, he bided his time.
sentences.chinese: 他咬牙切齒，在盤算如何毀滅敵人的遐想中打發時光。

sentences.english: I was just toying wit the idea of marrying my daugusthter off with him.
sentences.chinese: 我心裏正盤算着把我女兒嫁給他呢。

sentences.english: The man affirmed in assertion that he aimed to accost the accidental affirmation.
sentences.chinese: 那個人吆喝着申明說他盤算索回無目的的索賠。

definition: to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
to rack one's brains
to reckon/to calculate/to plan/to expect/to scheme
certain/confident (of some outcome)/calm and unhurried
unwilling
the cool eye of a bystander/a detached point of view
honest/reasonable/fair/sensible
timely/just (when needed)
different mouths, same voice/to speak in unison (idiom)
accustomed to/used to
to submit to humiliation (idiom); to suffer in silence/to swallow one's anger/to grin and bear it
things turn out contrary to the way one wishes (idiom)
aloof/indifferent/unconcerned
to hate/hatred/to resent/embittered
to remain unmoved
to do one's duty/to do one's bit conscientiously
to turn a blind eye to
